00040 #include "navigation_trajectory_common/FrameWithId.h"
00041 #include "navigation_trajectory_common/Conversions.h"
00042 #include "navigation_trajectory_common/Stopwatch.h"
00043 
00044 #ifdef DEBUG
00045 #include "navigation_trajectory_common/Logger.h"
00046 #endif
00047 
00048 #include "navigation_trajectory_planner/PathPlannerRos.h"
00049 
00050 #include <nav_core/base_global_planner.h>
00051 
00052 PathPlannerRos::PathPlannerRos(nav_core::BaseGlobalPlanner* planner) : planner(planner) {
00053 }
00054 
00055 PathPlannerRos::PathPlannerRos(const PathPlannerRos& orig) : planner(planner) {
00056 }
00057 
00058 PathPlannerRos::~PathPlannerRos() {
00059 }
00060 
00061 bool PathPlannerRos::computePath(const FrameWithId& start, const FrameWithId& goal, std::vector <FrameWithId>& path) {
00062 
00063     if (!planner) {
00064         ROS_ERROR("Planner instance in not allocated");
00065         return false;
00066     }
00067 
00068     geometry_msgs::PoseStamped startRos, goalRos;
00069     conversions::frameToPoseStampedRos(start, startRos);
00070     conversions::frameToPoseStampedRos(goal, goalRos);
00071     std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> pathRos;
00072 
00073 #ifdef DEBUG
00074     Stopwatch stopwatch;
00075     stopwatch.start();
00076 #endif    
00077 
00078     bool result = planner->makePlan(startRos, goalRos, pathRos);
00079     if (result) {
00080         pathRos.front() = startRos;
00081         pathRos.back() = goalRos;
00082     }
00083 
00084 #ifdef DEBUG    
00085     stopwatch.stop();
00086     LOG("A* path planning:");
00087     LOG("  - start: %f,%f,%f", startRos.pose.position.x, startRos.pose.position.y, tf::getYaw(startRos.pose.orientation));
00088     LOG("  - goal: %f,%f,%f", goalRos.pose.position.x, goalRos.pose.position.y, tf::getYaw(goalRos.pose.orientation));
00089     LOG("  - output size: %lu", pathRos.size());
00090     LOG("  - duration : %f ms", stopwatch.getElapsedTime());
00091 #endif 
00092 
00093     conversions::pathRosToPath(pathRos, path);
00094     return result;
00095 }
